Wisdom: إِنِّي إِذَا اسْتَحْكَمْتُ فِي الرَّجُلِ خَصْلَةً مِنْ خِصَالِ الْخَيْرِ احْتَمَلْتُهُ لَهَا وَاغْتَفَرْتُ لَهُ فَقْدَ مَا سِوَاهَا وَلَا أَغْتَفِرُ لَهُ فَقْدَ عَقْلٍ وَلَا عَدَمَ دِينٍ لِأَنَّ مُفَارَقَةَ الدِّينِ مُفَارَقَةُ الْأَمْنِ وَلَا تَهْنَأُ حَيَاةٌ مَعَ مَخَافَةٍ وَعَدَمُ الْعَقْلِ عَدَمُ الْحَيَاةِ وَلَا تُعَاشِرِ الْأَمْوَاتَ
enWisdom: Verily, when I find a quality from the good qualities firmly ingrained in a person, I judge him according to it, and I forgive him for not possessing other than it; but I never exonerate him for not possessing intelligence or for lacking religion, because separation from religion is departure from security, and life is not wholesome with fear, and lack of intellect is lack of life, and the dead are not interacted with
Deceived is the one whose faith is corrupt
Hardship in religion is the greatest of hardships

Wisdom: فَاقِدُ الدِّينِ مُتَرَدٍّ فِي الْكُفْرِ وَالضَّلَالِ
enWisdom: The one who lacks religion falls into disbelief and misguidance

Wisdom: كُلُّ عِزٍّ لَا يُؤَيِّدُهُ دِينٌ مَذَلَّةٌ
enWisdom: Every glory that is not endorsed by religion is a humiliation

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَسْتَقِيمُ مَنْ لَمْ يَسْتَقِمْ دِينُهُ
enWisdom: How can the heart of one whose faith is not steadfast be upright?
One who is stingy with his religion [and does not give it up for the sake of this world] becomes exalted

Wisdom: مَنْ لَا دِينَ لَهُ لَا مُرُوَّةَ لَهُ
enWisdom: He who has no religion has no magnanimity
One who corrupts his faith corrupts his Hereafter

Wisdom: مَنْ لَا دِينَ لَهُ لَا نَجَاةَ لَهُ
enWisdom: One who has no religion has no salvation

Wisdom: مَنْ غَشَّ النَّاسَ فِي دِينِهِمْ فَهُوَ مُعَانِدٌ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever deceives the people in their faith, then he is an opponent of Allah and His Prophet
One who is careless in his religion becomes lowly

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّخَذَ دَينَ اللَّهِ لَهْواً وَلَعِباً أَدْخَلَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ النَّارَ مُخَلَّداً فِيهَا
enWisdom: Whoever takes the religion of Allah as idle sport and play, Allah, the Glorified, will put him into the fire for eternity
Guard your religion by seeking help from Allah

Wisdom: لَا تَثِقَنَّ بِعَهْدِ مَنْ لَا دِينَ لَهُ
enWisdom: Never trust the promise of the one who has no religion
